commerceLaw.title: Legal Disclosure Based on Specified Commercial Transactions Act
commerceLaw.subtitle: Jurakuen
commerceLaw.intro: In accordance with the Specified Commercial Transactions Act, we provide the following disclosure:

commerceLaw.pricesInfo: Prices listed on each product page (tax included)
paymentMethodsList: Credit Cards (VISA, MasterCard, JCB, American Express, Diners Club, Discover)

commerceLaw.deliveryNote:

commerceLaw.returnsAccepted: Returns & exchanges accepted in the following cases:
returnsAcceptedList: When there are clear defects or damages to the product
When a different product from your order is delivered
When contacted within 7 days of product arrival
commerceLaw.returnsNotAccepted: Returns & exchanges not accepted in the following cases:
returnsNotAcceptedList: Returns due to customer preference (food products)
When 8 or more days have passed since product arrival
Products damaged or soiled due to customer responsibility
returnShippingList: When due to our responsibility: We cover the cost
When due to customer preference: Customer covers the cost
commerceLaw.privacyInfo: Personal information received from customers is used only for product shipping, communication, and our notifications, and will not be transferred or provided to third parties. Please refer to our "Privacy Policy" for details.
otherList: Product colors may appear different from actual products depending on your monitor
Product specifications and prices may change without notice
Services may be temporarily suspended due to system maintenance
Matters not specified in this disclosure shall be governed by the Consumer Contract Act and other applicable laws

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Jurakuen
privacyPolicy.basicPolicyText1: Jurakuen (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") fully recognizes its social responsibility for protecting customers' personal information and will collect and use personal information within the scope necessary for the smooth operation of services provided on this website, taking appropriate measures for its protection.
privacyPolicy.basicPolicyText2: The Company complies with laws and regulations regarding personal information protection, including the Personal Information Protection Act, and other standards, and implements appropriate handling of personal information.
privacyPolicy.definitionText: Personal information refers to "personal information" as defined in the Personal Information Protection Act, which is information about living individuals that can identify specific individuals through names, dates of birth, addresses, telephone numbers, contact information, and other descriptions contained in such information.
privacyPolicy.collectionText: The Company may collect personal information in the following cases:
collectionList: When entering information in inquiry forms
When participating in campaigns or events
privacyPolicy.usage: 4. Purpose of Use of Personal Information
privacyPolicy.usageText: The Company uses personal information for the following purposes:
usageList: Creating statistical materials for product development and service improvement
Providing other information deemed beneficial to customers
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyText: The Company will not provide personal information to third parties without prior consent from customers, except in the following cases:
thirdPartyList: When necessary to protect life, physical safety, or property
When particularly necessary for improving public health or promoting the sound development of children
When cooperation is necessary for national agencies, local governments, or their commissioned parties to perform duties prescribed by law
privacyPolicy.disclosure: 6. Disclosure, Correction, and Deletion of Personal Information
privacyPolicy.disclosureText: When customers request disclosure, correction, deletion, etc. of their personal information, we will respond after confirming their identity. Please contact our inquiry desk.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: Our website may use cookies to provide better services to customers. If you do not wish to use cookies, you can disable them in your browser settings.
privacyPolicy.managementText: The Company takes necessary and appropriate measures for the secure management of personal information to prevent leakage, loss, or damage. We also provide necessary and appropriate supervision to employees and contractors who handle personal information.
privacyPolicy.changesText: The Company may change this Privacy Policy as necessary. The revised Privacy Policy will take effect from the time it is posted on the Company's website.
privacyPolicy.contactHours: Business Hours: Weekdays 10:00-18:00 (Excluding weekends and holidays)

article1.title: Article 1 (Application)
article1.text1: These Terms of Service are intended to define the rights and obligations between users and Jurakuen (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") regarding the use of the "Jurakuen" website (hereinafter referred to as "this Site") operated by the Company, and shall apply to all relationships between users and the Company regarding the use of this Service.
article1.text2: When users use this Site, they shall be deemed to have agreed to these Terms of Service.

article2.title: Article 2 (Definitions)
article2.intro: The definitions of terms used in these Terms of Service are as follows:
definitions: "This Service" refers to all services provided by the Company, including online sales of matcha and matcha products, as well as the provision of related information.
"Users" refers to all persons who use this Service.

"Intellectual Property Rights" refers to copyrights, patent rights, utility model rights, trademark rights, design rights, and other intellectual property rights (including the rights to acquire such rights or to apply for registration of such rights).

article3.title: Article 3 (Terms of Use)
article3.intro: When using this Site, users must meet the following conditions:
conditions: Understanding and agreeing to the contents of these Terms of Service
Not being associated with antisocial forces

article4.title: Article 4 (Prohibited Acts)
article4.intro: Users shall not engage in the following acts when using this Service:
prohibitedActs: Acts that violate laws and regulations or public order and morals
Acts that destroy or interfere with the Company's servers or network functions
Acts that may interfere with the operation of the Company's services
Acts of collecting or storing personal information about other users
Acts of providing benefits directly or indirectly to antisocial forces in connection with the Company's services
Other acts deemed inappropriate by the Company

article5.title: Article 5 (Health Precautions)
article5.intro: To safely enjoy matcha products, please note the following:
restrictions: Those with caffeine intake restrictions should consult a physician before use
Pregnant or nursing women should be careful about consumption amounts
Depending on constitution or physical condition, allergic reactions may rarely occur

article6.title: Article 6 (Intellectual Property Rights)
article6.text1: Intellectual property rights related to content included in this Site (text, images, videos, audio, design, etc.) belong to the Company or rights holders who have granted the Company permission to use them.
article6.text2: Users may not reproduce, adapt, sell, or otherwise use the content of this Site without prior written permission from the Company.

article7.title: Article 7 (Disclaimer)
disclaimers: The Company assumes no responsibility for any damages arising from changes, interruptions, or termination of this Service.
The Company assumes no responsibility for disputes arising between users and third parties.
The Company makes no warranties regarding the accuracy, completeness, usefulness, etc. of information about matcha provided on this Site.
The Company assumes no responsibility for damages arising from users' use of this Service, except in cases of the Company's intentional or gross negligence.

article8.title: Article 8 (Changes to Service Content)
article8.text: The Company may change, add, or discontinue the content of this Service without notice to users, and users shall consent to this.

article9.title: Article 9 (Changes to Terms of Service)
article9.text: The Company may change these Terms of Service at any time without notice to users when deemed necessary. The revised Terms of Service shall take effect from the time they are displayed on this Site.

article10.title: Article 10 (Governing Law and Jurisdiction)
article10.text1: These Terms of Service shall be governed by Japanese law.
article10.text2: In the event of disputes related to this Service, the Shizuoka District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction as the court of first instance.

contact.hours: Business Hours: Weekdays 9:00-17:00 (Excluding weekends and holidays)

story.title: The Story of Jurakuen
story.paragraph1: Shizuoka Prefecture, Fuji City, Sakai district—walking a little from the terminal station of the Gakunan Electric Railway, you'll arrive at a small tea plantation spreading against the backdrop of the sacred Mount Fuji. This is Jurakuen, a family-run tea shop approaching its centennial. The tea garden, preserved through three generations, is now embarking on a new challenge of complete pesticide-free and chemical fertilizer-free cultivation.
story.paragraph2: What we pursued was 'a cup that is gentle to both body and environment.' Instead of chemical fertilizers, we incorporate homemade compost, and all weeds are removed by hand—this dedication to meticulous care has given birth to 'Fuji Matcha Kagayaki.'
story.paragraph3: Selecting only young leaves suitable for tencha, we concentrate umami through 21 days of shade cultivation. The tea leaves, after steaming and drying, are slowly ground by stone mills at the long-established Meiko Tea Industry, transforming into matcha with vivid green color and mellow sweetness.
story.paragraph4: Spring, when new buds sprout in the tea fields, and the wind rustles through them. The chirping of birds, Mount Fuji in the distance—because we want you to taste the entire landscape, Jurakuen sometimes opens tea picking and stone mill grinding experiences for those who wish. Freshly ground matcha enjoyed in the quiet countryside is exceptionally fragrant.

producer.title: Message from the Producer
producer.quote1: Growing tea relying only on nature's power, without chemical fertilizers or pesticides—this was certainly not an easy path.
producer.quote2: Manual weeding, managing homemade compost, dealing with weather. We had to learn everything from scratch. However, what we found at the end of this journey was a truly pure matcha flavor unlike anything we had tasted before.
producer.quote3: The tea we produce contains the learning and joy gained from this challenge. We hope that everyone who drinks it can also feel that radiance.
producer.name: Mochizuki

teaField.title: Tea Field Scenery
teaField.description: The landscape of lush green tea fields spreading out. In this place surrounded by greenery, you can feel the process of tea leaves growing. Please enjoy the sight of tea leaves swaying in the gentle wind and glimpses of farm work.
teaField.caption: Feel the rich green tea field landscape and nature's blessings.

reasons.organic: Cultivated without pesticides or chemical fertilizers
reasons.water: Pure spring water from the foot of Mount Fuji

organicJas.question: What is Organic JAS?
organicJas.answer: It is Japan's organic certification given only to agricultural products that meet strict standards without using pesticides or chemical fertilizers.

taste.question: What does it taste like?
taste.answer: Moderate bitterness and rich aroma, with mellow sweetness. Characterized by vivid green color and a refreshing aftertaste.

enjoyment.question: How do you enjoy it?
enjoyment.answer: Perfect not only for preparing usucha, but also for arrangements in matcha lattes and sweets.

heritage.title: Blessings of Sacred Mount Fuji
heritage.paragraph1: Mount Fuji, standing 3,776 meters tall as Japan's sacred peak. At the foot of this revered mountain, extraordinary tea is cultivated with ancient wisdom.
heritage.paragraph2: Pure spring water flowing from Mount Fuji, mineral-rich volcanic soil, and the temperature variations from high altitude—all harmonize to create an unparalleled depth of flavor found nowhere else.

elements.title: Three Sacred Gifts from Mount Fuji

water.title: Sacred Spring Water
water.description: Crystal-clear water filtered through volcanic rock layers infuses tea leaves with pure life force.

soil.title: Volcanic Soil
soil.description: Mineral-rich earth formed by volcanic activity bestows deep body and umami to every tea leaf.

climate.title: Highland Climate
climate.description: Temperature variations from high altitude strengthen tea leaves, developing intense and concentrated flavors.

blessing.title: Sacred Mountain's Protection
blessing.quote: In each cup infused with Mount Fuji's sacred energy, both mind and body find purification

mainHero.subtitle: TEA PRODUCTION PROCESS
mainHero.title: The Journey to a Perfect Cup of Tea
mainHero.description:
Two distinctive teas crafted with care by Jyurakuen.
Each production method embodies a century of history and artisan expertise.

matcha.name: Matcha
matcha.subtitle: MATCHA
matcha.description: Traditional Japanese powdered tea made from shade-grown tea leaves ground with stone mills

cultivation.title: Cultivation
cultivation.subtitle: The First Step in Nurturing Tea Life
cultivation.description: It takes approximately 5 years from planting tea trees to harvesting to create a single cup of tea.
cultivation.detail: To welcome the fresh spring tea, careful soil preparation and tea leaf management are carried out from the previous year, finally enabling harvest. Carefully nurtured in foot of Mt.Fuji's rich natural environment, tea trees are maintained in healthy condition to produce high-quality tea leaves.

harvest.title: Harvest
harvest.subtitle: Harvesting young tea shoots to draw out the tea’s inherent richness
harvest.description: Tea leaves for matcha are covered for 21 days before harvest to block sunlight and concentrate umami.
harvest.detail: Shade cultivation increases amino acids in tea leaves while suppressing tannin, the astringent component. This special cultivation method creates matcha's characteristic sweetness and umami, achieving a vibrant green color.

steaming.title: Steaming Process
steaming.subtitle: Stopping enzyme activity to preserve green color
steaming.description: Harvested tea leaves are steamed to stop enzyme activity and preserve the characteristic green color of green tea.
steaming.detail: Steaming is done for a short time of 20-30 seconds, stopping enzyme activity without damaging tea leaf cells. This process preserves the vivid green color and fresh aroma of the tea leaves.

drying.title: Drying
drying.subtitle: Processing into Tencha
drying.description: Steamed tea leaves are dried in a special furnace to create tencha.
drying.detail: By drying the tea leaves without rolling them, tencha is completed while preserving the leaf shape. This process reduces the moisture content of tea leaves to 3-4%, enabling long-term storage.

grinding.title: Stone Mill Grinding
grinding.subtitle: Traditional stone mills create ultra-fine powder
grinding.description: Tencha is carefully ground with stone mills to create smooth matcha powder.
grinding.detail: Stone mill grinding is performed at an amazingly slow pace of about 40g per hour. This careful process achieves the fineness of matcha particles and preserves its flavor.

sencha.name: Sencha
sencha.subtitle: SENCHA
sencha.description: Japan's most beloved green tea, characterized by refreshing aroma and moderate astringency

cultivation.title: Cultivation
cultivation.subtitle: Natural blessings through open-field cultivation
cultivation.description: Cultivated under direct sunlight to nurture the tea leaves' inherent robust flavor.
cultivation.detail: Tea leaves for sencha are cultivated in open fields without covering, making them rich in catechins and caffeine. They are characterized by moderate astringency and refreshing taste.

harvest.title: Harvest
harvest.subtitle: Efficient mechanical picking
harvest.description: When new shoots have grown, they are efficiently harvested by machine while maintaining freshness.
harvest.detail: First flush tea is harvested from late April to early May, second flush from late June to early July. Mechanical picking allows harvesting large quantities of tea leaves in fresh condition in a short time.

steaming.title: Steaming Process
steaming.subtitle: Deep steaming for rich flavor
steaming.description: Steaming longer than usual breaks tea leaf cells and draws out rich flavor.
steaming.detail: Deep-steamed sencha is steamed for 60-120 seconds, making tea leaves finer and extracting dark green tea in a short time. It is characterized by mild flavor with less astringency.

rolling.title: Rolling Process
rolling.subtitle: Shaping and concentrating umami
rolling.description: Tea leaves are rolled while drying, shaping them into needle-like elongated forms.
rolling.detail: Tea leaves are rolled in four stages: rough rolling, rolling, middle rolling, and final rolling, removing moisture while shaping into sencha's characteristic elongated form. This process breaks tea leaf tissue, making umami components easier to extract.

firing.title: Firing
firing.subtitle: Final finish determines aroma
firing.description: Appropriate firing enhances sencha's aroma and preservation qualities.
firing.detail: Firing removes excess moisture and brings out the aroma of tea leaves. The degree of firing creates a unique aroma called 'fire fragrance,' determining sencha's character.

conclusion.title:
A Cup of Tea Woven by
Tradition and Innovation
conclusion.description:
Matcha, hojicha, and sencha born from different production methods.
Please enjoy to your heart's content the artisan skills and natural blessings
embedded in each cup.

meta.title: Organic JAS Certification - Proof of Nature and Safety
meta.description: Learn about Jurakuen's Organic JAS certification. Our commitment to safe and environmentally friendly tea production without chemical pesticides or fertilizers, and the strict certification standards we meet.
meta.keywords: Organic JAS certification, organic tea, pesticide-free tea, Jurakuen, safe tea, environmental care, sustainable agriculture

hero.subtitle: ORGANIC JAS CERTIFICATION
hero.title:
Organic JAS Certification
Proof of Nature and Safety
hero.description:
Our commitment to safe and environmentally friendly tea production
that meets strict organic cultivation standards.
Delivering authentic flavors born from nature's bounty and artisan craftsmanship.

about.title: What is Organic JAS Certification
about.subtitle: Organic Japanese Agricultural Standards
about.description:
Registered certification bodies certify the business operators,  and those certified operators are allowed to label their products as organic.

We use only tea leaves cultivated without chemical pesticides or chemical fertilizers,  on soil that has undergone more than three years of organic farming practices.
about.imageCaptionDetail: Cultivation without any chemical pesticides or fertilizers

features.title: Four Features of Organic JAS Certification
features.description: Sustainable tea production that balances safety and environmental consideration

safety.title: Ensuring Safety
safety.description: We deliver safe and secure tea without using chemical pesticides or fertilizers. No worry about pesticide residues.

environment.title: Environmental Consideration
environment.description: We practice sustainable agriculture while protecting the natural environment without polluting soil or water quality.

health.title: Health Consideration
health.description: Through cultivation without chemicals, we offer healthy tea that maximizes the original nutritional components of tea leaves.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: To preserve beautiful nature for future generations, we practice circular agriculture that minimizes environmental impact.

standards.title: Strict Certification Standards
standards.description: To obtain Organic JAS certification, we meet all of the following stringent standards:

noChemicals.title: No Chemical Pesticides or Fertilizers
noChemicals.description: We cultivate on land where chemical pesticides and fertilizers have been prohibited for more than three years, not just during the cultivation period.

organicFertilizer.title: Only Certified Organic Fertilizers Used
organicFertilizer.description: We use only organic fertilizers approved by JAS standards while maintaining soil health and nurturing tea plants.

soilManagement.title: Soil and Environmental Management
soilManagement.description: We regularly inspect soil health and conduct cultivation in an environment that protects biodiversity.

traceability.title: Complete Traceability
traceability.description: We maintain detailed records throughout all processes from cultivation to manufacturing and distribution, ensuring quality and safety.

jasMark.title: This Mark is Proof of Quality
jasMark.description1: The Organic JAS mark is an official certification mark that can only be displayed on products that meet the strict standards established by the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries.
jasMark.description2: Products with this mark are guaranteed to be truly safe and environmentally friendly organic agricultural products that do not use chemical synthetic pesticides, chemical fertilizers, or genetic modification technology.

benefits.title: The Appeal of Organic Tea
benefits.description: Special value and deliciousness created through Organic JAS certification

taste.title: Authentic Flavor
taste.description: Without relying on chemicals, you can enjoy deep flavors that maximize the original umami and aroma of tea leaves.

nutrition.title: Rich Nutritional Components
nutrition.description: Tea leaves grown in healthy soil are rich in active ingredients such as catechins and amino acids, truly nature's bounty.

safety.title: Peace of Mind and Safety
safety.description: With no worry about pesticide residues, everyone from small children to elderly can drink with confidence.

jasNavigation.title: First Organic JAS Certification in Fuji City
jasNavigation.subtitle: Discover our commitment to safe and environmentally friendly tea production without any chemical pesticides or fertilizers.

certification.title: Organic JAS Certified
certification.description: Safe tea grown in soil that has been chemical-free for over 3 years, meeting strict organic cultivation standards.

cta.button: Learn More About Organic JAS Certification
cta.description: View detailed information about certification standards and our initiatives
cta.ariaLabel: Navigate to Organic JAS certification details page

overlay.title: Nature's Bounty & Artisan Craftsmanship
overlay.description: Organic tea cultivated at the foot of Mt. Fuji
